General.Name: Bangkok Dec-Con Public Company Limited
General.Description: Bangkok Dec-Con Public Company Limited manufactures, trades in, and interior decorates furniture in Thailand and internationally. The company provides its products and services to condominiums, hotels, office buildings, department stores, universities, hospitals, and government buildings. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.
General.Address: 52/3 Moo 8, Bangbuatong-Supanburi Road, Bang Bua Thong, Thailand, 11110

1.Name: Ms. Bussarin  Suwanrat
1.Title: Deputy Managing Director of Accounting & Fin.
